greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients in expansion of Eisenstein series E_1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000

M. Kaneko and D. Zagier, Supersingular j-invariants, hypergeometric series and Atkin's orthogonal polynomials, pp. 97-126 of D. A. Buell and J. T. Teitelbaum, eds., Computational Perspectives on Number Theory, Amer. Math. Soc., 1998
formula: a(0) = 1; for n >= 1, a(n) = 4*A000005(n). [After the PARI-program of _Michael Somos_.] - _Antti Karttunen_, May 25 2017
maple: with(numtheory); E:=proc(k) series(1-(2*k/bernoulli(k))*add( sigma[k-1](n)*q^n, n=1..60),q,61); end; E(1);
mathematica: terms = 61; CoefficientList[1+4*Sum[x^k/(1-x^k), {k, 1, terms}]+O[x]^terms, x] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 27 2018 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, n==0, 4 * numdiv(n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Jul 04 2011 */
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 28 2009
